summary: To further my career in sales, customer satisfaction and grow in business development.

experience.title: Sales Associate
experience.description: Exceed sales goals by up to 224% by implementing strategic sales tactics; generate new leads through professional relationships within the OTF community and B2B/community outreach; provide exceptional member experience; assist Studio Manager in keeping the team motivated; increase revenue in retail; onboarding OTF clients via the Client Intake Form; handoffs with coaches.

experience.title: Sales Representative
experience.description: Established new customer accounts; updated database with customer and sales information; generated high volume of referrals; cold-called prospective customers to build relationships.

experience.title: Residential Sales Specialist
experience.description: Sold TV, cable, internet and phone services onsite; increased revenue penetration to 97% across multiple properties; managed VIP and major accounts; upsold add-on services; trained sales teams; prepared monthly commission payrolls for 10+ representatives; developed annual sales plans for Miami and West Palm territories; monitored market conditions and adjusted sales approach.

education.school: The Art Institute of Ft. Lauderdale
